meanings.definition: Polystomatidae科（カメの膀胱に寄生する単生吸虫の一種）
meanings.english_definition: a family of monogenean flatworms that are parasitic in the urinary bladder of turtles.

etymology.value: From Polystoma (the type genus) + -idae (standard suffix for animal family names). Polystoma is derived from Greek polys 'many' + stoma 'mouth'.
